hero.headline: Violin lessons with Carla — warm, encouraging, and tailored to every student.
hero.body: Whether you're picking up the violin for the first time or preparing for an audition, Carla's studio pairs clear fundamentals with musicality and performance confidence.

highlights.title: Patient, musical teaching
highlights.copy: Carla blends multiple foundations of music with creative repertoire so students build confident tone, intonation, and musicianship at every age.

highlights.title: Clear weekly practice plans
highlights.copy: Each lesson ends with a written plan and audio clips for home practice. Parents get simple notes to keep progress steady.

highlights.title: Perform with ease
highlights.copy: Studio classes and twice-yearly recitals help students feel comfortable performing, auditioning, and leading in orchestra.

cards.name: 30-minute weekly
cards.description: Perfect for new players and young students. Gentle pace, lots of games, and posture-focused fundamentals.

cards.name: 45-minute weekly
cards.description: For growing students who want room for scales, etudes, and recital prep with meaningful feedback.

cards.name: 60-minute coaching
cards.description: Audition and ensemble prep, chair challenges, All-State, or polishing solo repertoire with detailed guidance.

notes.label: Where
notes.value: Near Wheeler High — 2207 Clearwater Dr, Marietta, GA 30067. Cozy home studio with dedicated practice space.

notes.label: How we meet
notes.value: In-person or Zoom. Clean copies of music, recordings, and practice notes provided after each lesson.

notes.label: Who I teach
notes.value: Beginners (age 6+), middle/high school orchestra students, and motivated adult learners.

students.title: What to expect each week
support: Weekly lesson notes emailed to students and parents
Two studio recitals each year with pianist provided
Studio classes for sight-reading and ensemble skills
Audition prep for chamber groups, youth orchestra, and All-State
Digital practice journal templates available on request

ctaCard.title: Parent & student quick help
ctaCard.body: Email Carla if you need a fresh practice plan, recordings, or to reschedule.

trial.title: Set up a trial lesson
trial.body: Tell me a bit about the student, experience level, and times that work best. We'll set a relaxed trial lesson and send you a simple practice outline afterward.

contactForm.title: Send a lesson request
contactForm.body: Share a few details and I'll reply with scheduling options and a simple next step.
